data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Rosario Abisso signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Milan's half.
In the minute 2, Milan to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Milan.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Milan.
In Milan, Alessio Romagnoli (Milan) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Giuseppe Meazza.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan's Alessio Romagnoli scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 17, Franck Kessie instrumental with a fine assist.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Milan's area.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 21, Dusan Vlahovic hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Milan for Fiorentina.
Throw-in Milan.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Milan.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Rosario Abisso awards the home team a throw-in.
Milan have been given a penalty at Giuseppe Meazza...
German Pezzella for Fiorentina has been booked by Rosario Abisso and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 27, Milan are going well in Milan. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Franck Kessie penalty.
Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
Fiorentina will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Milan.
In the minute 31, Milan's Theo Hernandez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu misses with an attempt on goal.
Rosario Abisso awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Milan have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Milan attack but Theo Hernandez's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Fiorentina are pushing forward but Jose Callejon's finish is wide of the goal.
Milan have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Rosario Abisso awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Giuseppe Meazza.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Milan.
Milan are awarded a penalty ... Franck Kessie botches the spot kick!
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 45, At Giuseppe Meazza the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Ante Rebic is booked for the home team.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Giacomo Bonaventura is replacing Jose Callejon for the away team.
Fiorentina drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 47, Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Rosario Abisso signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Milan's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 52, Gaetano Castrovilli (Fiorentina) gets a yellow card.
Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Sandro Tonali of Milan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan push upfield but Rosario Abisso quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 55, Fiorentina pushes forward through Franck Ribery, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
In Milan Milan attack through Hakan Calhanoglu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Milan's area.
In the minute 60, Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Fiorentina make their second substitution with Pol Lirola replacing Martin Caceres.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Fiorentina.
Milan to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Nikola Milenkovic (Fiorentina) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Milan have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In Milan Fiorentina's Giacomo Bonaventura is caught offside.
Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Franck Ribery with Patrick Cutrone.
Franck Kessie of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 69, Rosario Abisso awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Franck Kessie (Milan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Milan.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Giacomo Bonaventura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In the minute 75, Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a first substitution, with Rade Krunic replacing Brahim Diaz.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Borja Valero is on a sub for Gaetano Castrovilli for Fiorentina.
In the minute 77, Christian Kouame is on a sub for Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Milan.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Sandro Tonali with Jens Hauge.
In the minute 83, Milan are coming forward and Alexis Saelemaekers gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Giuseppe Meazza.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 85, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
In Milan, German Pezzella (Fiorentina) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 86, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Milan just outside Fiorentina's area.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi has been booked in Milan.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 88, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Milan.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Milan.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Sofyan Amrabat (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Rosario Abisso.
Diogo Dalot is replacing Alexis Saelemaekers for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
